00047 #ifndef ATOM_HEADER_INCLUDED
00048 #define ATOM_HEADER_INCLUDED
00049 
00050 #include <PDB_residues.H>
00051 #include <point_storage.H>
00052 
00053 namespace ASCbase{
00054 
00055 
00057 class atom_t : public point_t{
00058 public:
00059   atom_t(alloc_t a = ALLOC_POSITION) : point_t(a)
00060   {
00061     atom_num = 0;
00062     res_num = 0;
00063     name = NULL_ATOM_TYPE;
00064     res = NULL_RESIDUE;
00065     chainID = ' ';
00066     altLoc = ' ';
00067     iCode = ' ';
00068     occupancy = 0.00;
00069     tempFactor = 0.0;
00070     orbit = UNKNOWN_ORBIT;
00071     vdw_radius = 1000.0;
00072     is_hetero = false;
00073     act_type = UNKNOWN_INTERACTION;
00074     name_str = "";
00075     res_str = "";
00076     charge = 0.0;
00077     orig_charge = 0.0;
00078     subst_id = 0;
00079     hydro = 82;
00080   }
00081 
00082   // Must be a faster way to copy, but copying should not play a sigificant 
00083   // role in the speed for ASCbase
00084   atom_t(const atom_t& a) : point_t(a)
00085   {
00086     do_copy(a);
00087   }
00088 
00089   const atom_t& 
00090   operator=(const atom_t& a)
00091   {
00092     if(&a != this){
00093       do_copy(a);
00094       point_t::operator= (a);
00095     }
00096     return *this; 
00097   }
00098 
00099   ~atom_t() { ; }
00100 
00102   static bool 
00103   cmp(const atom_t &A, const atom_t &B)
00104   { return A.atom_num < B.atom_num; }
00105 
00107   const bool
00108   is_water() const
00109   {
00110     if(res == HOH) return true;
00111     else return false;
00112   } 
00113 
00115   const bool
00116   is_metal() const
00117   { return ( (res == PDB_METAL) ? true : false); }
00118 
00119   const bool
00120   is_nitrogen() const
00121   {
00122      if(name == N || name == ND1 || name == ND2 || name == NE || name == NE1
00123        || name == NE2 || name == NH1 || name == NH2 || name == NZ) 
00124        return true;
00125      return false;
00126   } 
00127 
00128   const bool
00129   is_oxygen() const
00130   {
00131     if(name == O || name == OD1 || name == OD2 || name == OE1 || name == OE2
00132        || name == OG || name == OG1 || name == OH) return true;
00133     return false;
00134   } 
00135 
00136   const bool
00137   is_hydrophobic() const
00138   {
00139     if(name == C || name == CA || name == CB || name == CD || name == CD1
00140        || name == CD2 || name == CE || name == CE1 || name == CE2 
00141        || name == CE3 || name == CG || name == CG1 || name == CG2 
00142        || name == CH2 || name == CH3 || name == CZ || name == CZ2 
00143        || name == CZ3 || name == S) return true;
00144     return false; 
00145   }
00146 
00147   const bool
00148   is_hbonder() const
00149   {
00150     if(res != PRO && is_nitrogen()) return true;
00151     else if(is_oxygen()) return true;
00152     return false;
00153   }
00154 
00155   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &out, const atom_t &a)
00156   {
00157     // Cheap hack for mol2 versus PDB
00158     if(a.res_str.length() == 0){
00159       if(a.name_str.length()) out << a.name_str;
00160       else{
00161         if(a.chainID != ' ') out << "(" << a.chainID << ")";
00162         out << PDB_residues::residue_to_string(a.res) << a.res_num;
00163         if(a.iCode != ' ') out << a.iCode;
00164         out << " " << PDB_residues::atom_to_string(a.name);
00165       }
00166     }else{
00167       if(a.chainID != ' ') out << "(" << a.chainID << ")";
00168       out << a.res_str << a.res_num;
00169       if(a.iCode != ' ') out << a.iCode;
00170       out << " " << a.name_str;
00171     }
00172     return out;
00173   }
00174 
00175   uint atom_num;       
00176   uint res_num;        
00177   atom_type name;      
00178   residue_type res;    
00179   char chainID;        
00180   char altLoc;         
00181   char iCode;          
00182   my_float_t occupancy; 
00183   my_float_t tempFactor; 
00184   orbit_type orbit;      
00185   my_float_t vdw_radius; 
00186   std::string name_str;  
00187   std::string res_str;   
00188   bool is_hetero;        
00189   interactionType act_type; 
00190   my_float_t charge;     
00191   my_float_t orig_charge;  
00192 
00193   int subst_id; 
00194   std::string subst_name; 
00195   int hydro;    
00196 
00197   static const atom_t NULL_ATOM;  
00198   static const point_storage<atom_t> NULL_ATOM_VECTOR;  
00199   static const point_storage<atom_t>::const_iterator NULL_ATOM_VCI;  
00200 
00201 private:
00202   void
00203   do_copy(const atom_t& a)
00204   {
00205     atom_num = a.atom_num;
00206     res_num = a.res_num;
00207     name = a.name;
00208     res = a.res;
00209     chainID = a.chainID;
00210     altLoc = a.altLoc;
00211     iCode = a.iCode;
00212     occupancy = a.occupancy;
00213     tempFactor = a.tempFactor;
00214     orbit = a.orbit;
00215     vdw_radius = a.vdw_radius;
00216     name_str = a.name_str;
00217     res_str = a.res_str;
00218     is_hetero = a.is_hetero;
00219     act_type = a.act_type;
00220     charge = a.charge;
00221     orig_charge = a.orig_charge;
00222     subst_id = a.subst_id;
00223     subst_name = a.subst_name;
00224     hydro = a.hydro;
00225   };
00226 
00227 };
00228 
00229 typedef point_storage<atom_t> atom_vec_t;
00230 typedef atom_vec_t::iterator atom_vi;
00231 typedef atom_vec_t::const_iterator atom_vci;
00232 typedef std::map<uint, atom_vci> atom_map_t;

00235 } // end of namespace ASCbase
